content.text:
Reflecting on [this thread](%FWwFYWPFAgQWh0fStot08GoDkK9c/HPYZvpE36vTKjs=.sha256), I've been thinking lots today about sustainable open source and I keep coming back to the same question: **what are our other options?**

Most of us don't want advertisements to be the ultimate funding model, but there haven't been many other solutions proposed. I'd love to use this thread to collect **possible solutions for sustainable open-source funding**. If possible, please use top-level comments for solutions and on-topic discussions, using nested comments to reply to a specific solution.
